external_references.source_name: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025
external_references.description: Matej Havranek. (2025, February 20). DeceptiveDevelopment targets freelance developers. Retrieved October 17, 2025.
Seongsu Park. (2024, November 4). From Pyongyang to Your Payroll: The Rise of North Korean Remote Workers in the West. Retrieved October 17, 2025.
Unit 42. (2023, November 21). Hacking Employers and Seeking Employment: Two Job-Related Campaigns Bear Hallmarks of North Korean Threat Actors. Retrieved October 17, 2025.

objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has downloaded “AnyDesk.exe” into the user’s home directory from the C2 server when checks for the service fail to identify its presence in the victim environment.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025) [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has also been configured to download additional payloads using a command which calls to the /bow URI.(Citation: Zscaler ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)
